heading: HB00002
0: AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9344, AS AMENDED BY REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10630, AND REVERTING THE MINIMUM AGE OF CRIMINAL RESPONSIBILITY FROM FIFTEEN (15) YEARS OLD TO NINE (9) YEARS OLD
short-title: Minimum Age Of Criminal Responsibility Act
principal-authors: CASTRO, FREDENIL "FRED" H.; ALVAREZ, PANTALEON D.;
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2019-01-28, transmitted to the Senate on 2019-01-30 and received by the Senate on 2019-01-30 Substituted by HB08858
